thread.section_title: Hotel Eiffel Seine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: dubsfan2015
title: Great location
text: This is a small hotel in an excellent location, metro station across the road and Eiffel Tower 5 minutes walk away. The staff are very helpful and friendly, we had to wait to check in as our room wasn't ready and were given a complementary drink while we waited. Rooms are small but have everything you need would absolutely recommend a visit here if you are planing a visit to Paris.
